messages.message: Hello engineering friends! I am looking for some help with some vulnerabilities that showed up across a handful of services. BofA won’t let us deploy until it resolved, so it is high urgency, but I think it is also relatively low effort. We are looking to deliver mid week. I’ve broken it down to a bunch of services with boto vendering old libraries, a flower problem (javascript, strangely), and some OS vulns on rabbitmq.
It looks like it should just be upgrading boto and flower for those two, I am working on the OS vulns for rabbit.
@will - what is the vuln for rabbitmq?
Not rabbitmq itself, but some OS packages. I am still analyzing, but at least some of these are getting flagged for patched versions and I am working on why.
